metadata.description: Open-source tool focused on AI image generation. Transform your creative ideas into stunning visuals through natural conversation with advanced AI models.

hero.title: Chat Your Way to Amazing Images
hero.subtitle: Simply describe what you want to see, and watch as Typix transforms your words into stunning AI-generated images through natural conversation.
hero.chatPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to create...

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Focused on AI image generation, turning your ideas into visual art instantly

selfHosted.title: Self-hosted
selfHosted.subtitle: Complete control over your data and privacy

localFirst.title: Local-first
localFirst.subtitle: Prioritizes local storage and offline functionality

oneClickDeploy.title: One-click Deploy
oneClickDeploy.subtitle: Deploy instantly with Docker or Cloudflare Workers

multiModel.title: Multi-Model Support
multiModel.subtitle: Support for multiple AI models and providers

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.subtitle: Seamless synchronization across all your devices

freeGeneration.title: Free Generation
freeGeneration.subtitle: Powered by Cloudflare Workers AI for zero-cost image creation

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Generate high-quality images in seconds with our optimized AI models.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Create stunning 4K images with exceptional detail and clarity.

styles.title: Multiple Styles
styles.description: Choose from dozens of artistic styles and customize every aspect.

creative.title: Creative Control
creative.description: Fine-tune parameters and prompts for perfect results every time.

ai.title: Advanced AI
ai.description: Powered by state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Export in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, and more.

gallery.title: Explore Creative Possibilities
gallery.subtitle: Discover the endless potential of AI-generated art across different styles and themes.

preview.title: Create Anywhere
preview.subtitle: Experience Typix's powerful AI image generation across all your devices.

keyFeatures.title: Why Choose Typix?
keyFeatures.subtitle: Built with privacy, performance, and cost-efficiency in mind

providers.title: Powered by Leading AI Models
providers.subtitle: Integrated with the most advanced AI models and services for the best image generation experience
providers.footer: More providers and models are being added regularly

footer.subtitle: AI Image Generator
footer.description: Transform your words into stunning visuals with our advanced AI image generation technology.
